scripts.create:ibmcloud: ibmcloud fn action create facility/getCoordinatesByAddress --kind nodejs:12 getCoordinatesByAddress.zip
scripts.deploy:ibmcloud: ibmcloud fn action update facility/getCoordinatesByAddress --kind nodejs:12 getCoordinatesByAddress.zip
scripts.deploy: npm run zip && npm run deploy:ibmcloud && rm getCoordinatesByAddress.zip
